definitions.definition: To express one’s sympathetic pleasure or joy to the person(s) it is felt for; to felicitate.
examples: Remind me to congratulate Dave and Lisa on their wedding.
We must congratulate Dave and Lisa on getting married.

definitions.definition: To consider oneself fortunate in some matter.
examples: I congratulated myself on the success of my plan.

main_definition: To express one’s sympathetic pleasure or joy to the person(s) it is felt for; to felicitate.
secondary_definitions: ( reflexive ) To consider oneself fortunate in some matter.
